name: Dead Nightmare
description:
An entry to Game Endeavor Jam #3

You go to sleep, and soon see a room full of zombies, some clones of yourself and a counter.

Embark in a short adventure about random and unbalanced equipment and weapons in a randomly generated map, with blind zombies, in a nightmare, or is it a dream?

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys to move

  • Shift to run
  • Control to crouch
  • Left click to shoot
  • Right/Middle click to swing your sword (or hand, or knife)
  • Spacebar to throw a bomb (the radius indicator turns red when there is a zombie inside)

Music made by Nicole Marie T

Code by me (Bowuigi)

Sprites: Zombie and player made by me, the rest made by Kenney
